NOTE
A limited nuiid>er of prints are maintained in the film center of DAVI at the
NEA headquarters in Washington. These circulating prints are booked until
late 1964. While prints are not available at this time from DAVI, %ie ask
that you contact the library nearest you. Each library reserves the right
to set a rental fee to fit their requirements.
For sale prints or preview prints with intent to purchase, write directly to
DAVI. Purchase prints are $50.00.
DEPARTMENT OF AUDIOVISUAL INSTRUCTION
